page.title: 13BALFRON LIBRARY
page.content: The{library}in Balfron has two librarians who deal with about 250 borrowers each week. The library has a wide selection of books-ten thousand- with more fiction than non-fiction. A system of inter-library exchanges allows the librarians to obtain books from other libraries, should they be requested. The library is used regularly by {children}of all ages and, as well as books, there are talk-books,cassettes, and audio-records, and story time is held each week. A festival week is held annually, with a disco, painting competition and treasure-hunt to encourage the children to use the library. A large{mobile library}is sent to serve outlying houses in the area. Books with very large print are in supply for those with poor eyesight.
